localResource.name: Data_Centers
localResource.label: Data_Centers
localResource.queryString: Select distinct cast(datacenter_id as varchar), delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN RTrim(cast(datacenter_name as varchar)) ELSE RTrim(cast(datacenter_name as varchar)) || ' (Removed on ' || cast(delete_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name from v3_2_configuration_history_datacenters WHERE datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_2_configuration_history_clusters WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT a.cluster_id FROM v3_2_configuration_history_vms a)) AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_2_configuration_history_datacenters a GROUP BY a.datacenter_id) $P!{Active_VMs} UNION ALL SELECT distinct '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', cast(null as timestamp), 'Non Available' WHERE NOT EXISTS (Select distinct datacenter_id from v3_2_configuration_history_datacenters WHERE datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_2_configuration_history_clusters WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT a.cluster_id FROM v3_2_configuration_history_vms a)) AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_2_configuration_history_datacenters a GROUP BY a.datacenter_id) $P!{Active_VMs}) order by delete_date DESC, combo_name
